column4: "We have just secured a big arms deal. We will be exporting some of our weapons and vehicles in exchange for money and other things. This should boost our economy and improve our relations with the country with whom we negotiated!"

column5: which has a negative effect on GDP. Our state needs a greater supply of money to increase investment and stabilize the economy."

column4: "Our state has a high inflation rate because of high money supply and low wages. This has a negative effect on purchasing power and GDP. Our monetary strength is low and people fall into poverty. Many people do not invest in consumer goods."
"Sweden has a big gang problem. We need to fund our police to fight it!"
